bio:
Indara Caerellia is an Imperial farmer in Falkreath.
Indara is the wife of Mathies and owns Corpselight Farm in Falkreath with him. They had a nine-year-old daughter named Lavinia, but she was lost recently when Sinding, a transient worker, murdered Lavinia at the lumber mill in town. Indara and her husband are first encountered by the player in the cemetery, attending their daughter's funeral, which is led by Runil.
Quotes:
Indara: "Thank you, Runil. Your support means much to us."
name: Indara Caerellia
